<?php
/*
Plugin Name: WooCommerce Subscriptions
Plugin URI: https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-subscriptions/
Description: Adds subscription functionality to WooCommerce.
Version: 1.0.0
Author: Your Name
Author URI: https://yourwebsite.com
Text Domain: woocommerce-subscriptions
Domain Path: /languages

WC requires at least: 3.0
WC tested up to: 8.0
WooCommerce: true
*/

if (!defined('ABSPATH')) {
    exit;
}

class WC_Subscriptions {
    public static function init() {
        add_action('plugins_loaded', array(__CLASS__, 'init_subscriptions'));
    }

    public static function init_subscriptions() {
        if (!class_exists('WooCommerce')) {
            return;
        }
        // Basic subscription functionality
        add_filter('woocommerce_product_class', array(__CLASS__, 'add_subscription_product_class'), 10, 2);
    }

    public static function add_subscription_product_class($classname, $product_type) {
        if ($product_type === 'subscription') {
            $classname = 'WC_Product_Subscription';
        }
        return $classname;
    }
}

WC_Subscriptions::init();

<?php
/*
Plugin Name: WC Smooth Generator
Plugin URI: https://yourwebsite.com/wc-smooth-generator
Description: Generate WooCommerce products smoothly
Version: 1.0.0
Author: Your Name
Author URI: https://yourwebsite.com
Text Domain: wc-smooth-generator
*/

if (!defined('ABSPATH')) {
    exit;
}

class WC_Smooth_Generator {
    private static $instance = null;

    public static function instance() {
        if (is_null(self::$instance)) {
            self::$instance = new self();
        }
        return self::$instance;
    }

    public function create_products($args = array()) {
        $defaults = array(
            'count' => 1,
            'type' => 'simple',
            'virtual' => false,
            'downloadable' => false,
            'price' => array('min' => 10, 'max' => 100),
            'subscription_period' => array('month'),
            'subscription_period_interval' => array(1)
        );

        $args = wp_parse_args($args, $defaults);

        for ($i = 0; $i < $args['count']; $i++) {
            $title = 'Product ' . ($i + 1);
            $price = rand($args['price']['min'] * 100, $args['price']['max'] * 100) / 100;
            
            $post_id = wp_insert_post(array(
                'post_title' => $title,
                'post_type' => 'product',
                'post_status' => 'publish'
            ));

            wp_set_object_terms($post_id, $args['type'], 'product_type');
            update_post_meta($post_id, '_price', $price);
            update_post_meta($post_id, '_regular_price', $price);
            
            if ($args['type'] === 'subscription') {
                $period = $args['subscription_period'][array_rand($args['subscription_period'])];
                $interval = $args['subscription_period_interval'][array_rand($args['subscription_period_interval'])];
                
                update_post_meta($post_id, '_subscription_period', $period);
                update_post_meta($post_id, '_subscription_period_interval', $interval);
            }

            if (isset($args['category'])) {
                wp_set_object_terms($post_id, $args['category'], 'product_cat');
            }

            if (isset($args['featured']) && $args['featured']) {
                update_post_meta($post_id, '_featured', 'yes');
            }
        }
    }
}

WC_Smooth_Generator::instance();
